title: Ayurveda detox
author: Kerry Harling
cleaned_text: leave your unhealthy habits behind, once and for all. Ayurveda is an ancient way of healing through food. Through an ayurvedic approach, Dr. Kerry Harling uses food as medicine. They will help you find the root causes of poor mental health and aid you in finding physical, mental, and spiritual balance. Author BiographyKerry Harling is a licensed Ayurvedic physician and CEO of The Holistic Highway. She has a practice at the University of Pittsburgh Center for Integrative Medicine, directs the Ayurveda Sanctuary, is a registered practitioner with the National Ayurvedic Medical Association, and is a certified yoga teacher.
